messages: c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:01): Why isn't there an annual "Update your browser" day? It could be the day that all web developers update as many browsers as possible. We can have competitions with prizes for the most browsers updated. We need an official spokesperson for this cause. ahem *nudge 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 - I know you're busy with w3fools - but I say the next meme should be an annual "Update your browser day"
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (08:02): what do i do as a chrome user
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:02): well as a chrome user obviously you are stoked - but it could be for all the rest of the world not on chrome
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:02): that can be part of the prize - how many people can you get to upgrade to a modern browser
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:03): upgrade your browser - free your mind
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:05): upgrade your browser - save a web developer
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:05): what would be the best time of year to do it?
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:06): the day with most of people online
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:08): but that's a shopping day - would it be smart to piggy back another action (upgrading browsers) onto that day?
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:08): people would probably be reticent to do update this day...
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:11): what would be the upgrade your browser day mascot?
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:12): how do you visually and creatively show a browser that needs to be updated?
38e5971429bb0f30aa410ac1ae0bb9a9 (08:12): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049, What Browser? - Try a New Browser - http://www.whatbrowser.org/en/browser/
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:14): also how would you keep track of how many you updated? a browser extension that you install each time?
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:14): it would be good to digitally track that so you could have metrics of how many browsers were updated
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:15): that would actually be pretty cool
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:16): if each time you got someone to update to chrome or FF or safari you installed a plugin and put in your code or something and it tracked how many you updated
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:17): hey I made a site kinda like that, trying to edge peeps away from old IE  :)
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:17): so we are off to a start -
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:18): though I do wish I could design better lol
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:19): actually I dig how this is all one long page
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:19): that scrolls up and down when you click the buttons
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:20): so has anyone tried to get a bunch of people to upgrade browsers all at once on one day before that I should be aware of?
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:20): 2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480: you should put links to anchors on bad/good points :)
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:20): 24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360: like menu item type links directly to the list stuff?
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:21): good idea thanks, ill do that tomorrow morning!
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:22): I wish you have a french version I could redirect my
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:22): lol I wish I spoke french so I could make one :D
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:23): ah, did not think of that!
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:23): cool ill do that tomorrow too
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:23): also, will give me excuse to learn how to use github more ha
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (08:23): 24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360: can't you wget it all?
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:24): and I'm not the only french man in the place ;)
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:24): one day ill learn a second language :p
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:25): heh someone viewed the source on my new site redesign and tweeted one of my code comments
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:26): it happened to me too ;) I wrote something like if($('html').hasClass('ie7') || $('html').hasClass('ie8')) {¬†// no arm, no chocolate
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:27): I don't know if the expression exists in english...
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:27): no arm, no chocolate is enough meaningful ? :)
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:29): the worst part was inside brackets...
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:34): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049: I'm just realizing how much mothereffinghsl would have help me a few months ago ...
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:34): google maps use this instead of rgba for customization
2d1e55eae334050f5c370c7c592b0480 (08:38): goodnight folks, 24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 catch ya on github by tomorrow :D
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:53): tomorrow is already today for me...
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (08:54): 24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360: wait did you do the daviidguitta site?
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (08:55): not very glad of some things because the project was already late when I started but it's cool
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (09:00): as the developer, I'm self-critizing about it, it could have been better if I had more time ;)
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (09:01): for example, the scroll is very special on this site and could have been improved
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (09:01): I'm also sad it's not working right now on mobile devices, I'll work on a dedicated version later
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:01): f94f854949fc94f06c85986f1e814b34: thanks - whats the next step?
f94f854949fc94f06c85986f1e814b34 (09:02): c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2: im working on apps, i will use this idea
